Package br.com.ctseducare.validation

Class CTSValidation

java.lang.Object
br.com.ctseducare.validation.CTSValidation
public class CTSValidation extends Object
The CTSValidation class provide resources to validate names, emails, dates, telephones numbers, zip codes and much others.
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Eros Vitor Bornatowski (erosborna@gmail.com)
